guide.title: Connecting to other devices while using VPN
guide.subtitle: Enabling local network access allows you to connect to other devices without sacrificing your VPN protection.

blocks.content: How do I connect to my printer or fax?

content.content: Enable “Local network access” in your network settings
Connect the printer or fax cable to your device’s port (wired) or via wireless
Print or fax your documents as normal
